name: A Dark-Adapted Mind
description:
Written years ago, touched up with some minor edits. As a warning, there is some depressing subject matter.

Images were released under Creative Commons license or through FreeImages.com's licensing. Images are by Joanie Cahill, Miguel Ugalde, Nenad Nerandzic, Gavin Mills, Bill Darby, and Shannon Kringen and elvis santana.
